entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Gjoa Haven
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:13 p.m. MDT Tuesday 9 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Rain showers or flurries. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain changing to rain showers or a few flurries this evening. Risk of freezing rain this evening and overnight. Wind east 30 km/h. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 5:07 PM MDT Tuesday 9 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Light snow. Temperature falling to minus 2 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Light snow. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to minus 2 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:07 PM MDT Tuesday 9 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 60%
